title: Corner Protest
description: Join us for the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday to engage positively in protecting democracy and expressing our stance on societal issues. This event encourages participation from both sides of the political spectrum with the message 'we all know this is WRONG!'
address: SW Corner of Drake and College
raw_text:
Join the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday 3:15-5:15 PM

SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins

Positive engagement

PROTECT DEMOCRACY

Right or Left ... we all know this is WRONG!

WE THE PEOPLE

OMG GOP WTF

Tuesday, Dec 2, 2025

3:15 - 5:15 pm

2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_summary: The image promotes a recurring protest event called "Corner Protest" that takes place every Tuesday and Thursday from 3:15 to 5:15 PM at the southwest corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins, Colorado. The focus of the protest is positive engagement around issues such as democracy protection.
